data.content:
noun
plural -ties
[noncount] :a simple and plain quality :an austere quality
the austerity of the design
The austerity of their lifestyle was surprising.
[noncount] :a situation in which there is not much money and it is spent only on things that are necessary
They lived through years of austerity after the war. - often used before another noun
The government has announced a series of austerity measures. [=things done to save money during difficult economic times]
an austerity program
austerities [plural] :things that are done to live in a simple and plain way
the austerities practiced by monks

Danh từ
sự khác khổ
war was followed by many years of austerity
sau chiến tranh là nhiều năm khắc khổ
(thường số nhiều)
nếp sống khắc khổ; điều kiện khắc khổ
wartime austerities included food rationing and shortage of fuel
những khắc khổ thời chiến bao gồm việc phân phối lương thực theo khẩu phần và sự khan hiếm chất đốt
